amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to require that funds in the bill are available only to the extent provided for in authorizing legislation enacted before the date of the enactment of the bill or on or after such date.

action.text: Mr. Dicks raised a point of order against the Pombo amendment (A022). Mr. Dicks stated that the provisions of the amendment sought to change existing law and consitituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
